page.title: 07Scott's Sad Illness
page.content: The Greaves family are a very pleasant family who live in Askern. They now have four grandchildren, one of whom,Scott,lived a normal life until he was 5,when doctors discovered he was suffering from Cystic Fibrosis. Since this time Scott has been treated with special massage treatment and also takes pills every day.No matter how much time is spent on Scott his disease is incurable. When people heard of this sad case, they helped to raise money for him. The local chip shop owners,the jazz band and my mother,a hairdresser,all contributed in some way. The money is to pay for Scott's visit to Lourdes, where people have been miraculously cured. This is Scott's only hope and everyone wishes him luck.
